Table: contributor

A contributor is an organization, a role, and optionally a person.

contributor Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id serial PRIMARY KEY

An opaque numeric identifier for this contributor.
person.id person_id integer UNIQUE#1

The person (optional).
role_type.identifier role_type_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The role.
organization.identifier organization_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The organization.

 

contributor Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_person_org CHECK (((person_id IS NOT NULL) OR (organization_identifier IS NOT NULL)))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

publication_contributor_map
